title: Plan a birthday (Algorithms)
summary: Learn step-by-step planning as an algorithm.
body:
An algorithm is a clear list of steps to do something. For a birthday, you need a plan so things happen in the right order.

What to do: Put the actions into the correct order so the party is ready on time.
body_af:
'n Algoritme is 'n duidelike lys van stappe om iets te doen. Vir 'n verjaarsdag het jy 'n plan sodat dinge in die regte volgorde gebeur.

Wat om te doen: Sit die aksies in die korrekte volgorde sodat die partytjie betyds gereed is.
body_xh:
I-algorithm yinkcazo yesinyathelo ngesinyathelo sokwenza into. Ngosuku lokuzalwa, ufuna isicwangciso ukuze izinto zenziwe ngendlela efanelekileyo.

Yenza: Beka izenzo ngokulandelelana okufanelekileyo ukuze umnyhadala ulungile ngexesha.

title: Sort shop stock (Data organization)
summary: Group items to make them easy to find.
summary_af: Groepeer items om dit maklik te vind.
summary_xh: Beka izinto ezifanayo ukuze kube lula ukuzifumana.
body:
Data organization means grouping similar things so they are easier to find. In a small shop, foods go together and cleaning items go together.

What to do: Move each item into the correct category box (Food or Cleaning).
body_af:
Data-organisasie beteken om soortgelyke goed te groepeer sodat dit makliker is om te vind. In 'n klein winkel pas kos by kos en skoonmaakmiddels by mekaar.

Wat om te doen: Verskuif elke item na die korrekte kategorie blokkie (Kos of Skoonmaak).
body_xh:
Ukuhlelwa kwedatha kuthetha ukubeka izinto ezifanayo kunye ukuze kube lula ukuzifumana. Kwivenkile encinci, ukutya kubekwa kunye nokucoca izinto ndawonye.

Yenza: Hambisa into nganye kwibhokisi efanelekileyo (Ukutya okanye Ukucoceka).

title: What to do when it rains (Flowcharts)
title_af: Wat om te doen wanneer dit reën (Vloei-kaarte)
body:
Flowcharts are a way to decide what to do based on conditions, like whether it will rain. They help you pick the right action step by step.

What to do: Choose the action that fits the weather condition in each box.
body_af:
Vloei-kaarte help jou besluit watter aksie om te neem afhangende van 'n toestand, soos of dit gaan reën. Hulle lei jou stap vir stap.

Wat om te doen: Kies die aksie wat by die weerstoestand in elke blokkie pas.
body_xh:
Ii-flowchart zindlela zokukhetha isenzo ngokusekelwe kwiimeko, njengoko ingaba iya kulila na. Zikukhokela ukuba wenze isigqibo ngesinyathelo.

Yenza: Khetha isenzo elifanelekileyo kwimeko yemozulu kwibhokisi nganye.

title: Fix the timetable (Debugging)
summary: Find and correct mistakes in a schedule.
summary_af: Vind en reg die foute in 'n skedule.
body:
Debugging means finding mistakes and fixing them. A timetable with activities in the wrong places needs correcting so the day makes sense.

What to do: Put each activity into the correct time slot so the schedule is fixed.
body_af:
Ontfouting beteken om foute te vind en reg te maak. 'n Rooster met aktiwiteite in die verkeerde plekke moet reggestel word sodat die dag sin maak.

Wat om te doen: Plaas elke aktiwiteit in die korrekte tydgleuf sodat die rooster reg is.
body_xh:
Ukulungisa iimpazamo kuthetha ukufumana iimpazamo kunye nokuzilungisa. Ishedyuli enezinto ezingalunganga kufuneka ilungiswe ukuze usuku lube nentsingiselo.

Yenza: Beka umsebenzi ngamnye kwixesha elifanelekileyo ukuze ishedyuli ilungiswe.

title: If/Else farming tasks (Logical thinking)
body:
If/Else rules help you make decisions: if a condition is true do one thing, else do another. Farmers use simple rules to choose tasks.

What to do: Place the task that matches each condition (for example, water if the plants are thirsty).
body_af:
If/Else reëls help jou besluit: as 'n toestand waar is, doen iets; anders doen iets anders. Boere gebruik eenvoudige reëls om take te kies.

Wat om te doen: Sit die taak wat by elke toestand pas (bv water as die plante dors is).
body_xh:
Imithetho ye-If/Else ikunceda ukhethe: ukuba imeko inyanisekile yenza enye into, kungenjalo enye. Abooti basebenzisa imithetho elula ukukhetha imisebenzi.

Yenza: Beka umsebenzi ohambelana nemeko nganye (umzekelo, faka amanzi ukuba izityalo zimanzi).

title: Household budget (Data literacy)
summary: Prioritize expenses to balance a small household budget.
summary_af: Prioritiseer uitgawes om 'n klein huishoudelike begroting in balans te hou.
summary_xh: Beka phambili iindleko ukuze imali ihlale.
body:
A household budget means deciding which expenses are most important so money lasts. Some items are essential, others are optional.

What to do: Put each expense into the right group from essential to optional.
body_af:
'n Begroting beteken besluit watter uitgawes belangrik is sodat geld volhou. Sommige items is noodsaaklik, ander opsioneel.

Wat om te doen: Sit elke uitgawe in die regte groep van noodsaaklik tot opsioneel.
body_xh:
Isabelomali sasekhaya kuthetha ukucwangcisa iindleko ukuze imali ihlale. Ezinye izinto zibalulekile, ezinye zingakhethwa.

Yenza: Beka iindleko nganye kwiqela elifanelekileyo ukusuka kubalulekile ukuya kokuzenzela.
